Syllabus
MyFirstApp

Technologies

HTML
Elements & Attributes - DevTools for playground
Validation
Forms & Regular Expression patterns
Tables & Legacy:
  • Table Layout with deprecated elements and attributes (Create a HTML guide page with it)
  • Inline CSS (floats & clears)
  • Internal CSS (dialog element backdrop)
  • Inline JS (dialog element)
  • Internal JS (canvas, noscript, etc...) with jQuery (animations)
CSS
Setup Sass & PostCSS
Rulesets - DevTools for playground on basic styles of HTML elements
Code-Style-Guides - and Error handling
CSS Modules
SCSS Features - on a playground
Selectors & Specificity
Shorthands
Fonts & Icons
Variables & Calc
Box Model, positioning, overflow
Dark & Light mode
Responsive Design including:
  • B__E--M
  • Units
  • @media queries (use mixins)
  • Flexbox & Playground
Grid & Playground
Animations (+ transform, transition, @keyframe, etc...)
Bootstrap - Create a JS & TS guide page with it (for DOM).
TailwindCSS - Create NodEJS guide page with it.
JS
Concepts:
  1. Frontend
    1. Setup Webpack, TS, Babel, ESLint, Jest
    2. About ESNext (engines, Event loop, etc...)
    3. Error handling, Code quality, DevTools Snippets (BOM API - window object, console)
    4. Modules
    5. Variables, Scopes, Hoisting, null, undefined
    6. Data-typeof, Primitive DTs, Reference (object) DTs
    7. Number (& Floats) DT; E.xponential constants; Properties; Methods & Type Conversion; Type Coercion; Math.object - Properties & Methods; Arithmetic & Increment / Decrement operators; BigInt DT; Methods & Type conversion
    8. String DT; Concatenation; Properties & Methods & Type conversion; Template; Iteration
    9. Boolean DT; Type conversion (truthy / falsy); Comparison operators
    10. Symbol DT
    11. RegExp DT
    12. Date Object DT; Methods; Timestamps; Date-fns library
    13. Conditionals: if/else statements; Ternary operator expressions; Logical operators;Switch statement
    14. Loops: while; do while; for
    15. Function DT; declaration; expression, Parameters & Arguments, return keyword; IIFE; Arrow function; Callback function; Closures; Recursion; Rest operator; Spread operator; arguments variable
    16. Array DT; Properties & Methods & Type conversion; Iterations (find(), findIndex(), findLast() & findLastIndex(); filter(); map() & flatMap(); forEach(); every(); some(); reduceRight() & reduce(); reverse() & sort() & toSorted() & toReversed()); ArrayBuffer DT; Set DT; Iteration; WeakSet DT
    17. Object literal DT; . notation => using properties & methods; [] notation & computed properties; Iterations; Cloning; Methods; Map DT; Properties & Methods; Iterations; Type conversion; WeakMap DT
    18. OOP; this operator keyword; Constructor functions & Prototype; new operator keyword; instanceof operator; Inheritance; Class (constructor(), static, Getters & Setters, private fields, mixins; extends, super(), override properties & methods)
    19. Async: Event loop & Callback hell; Promise & HTTP Request (XHR); async / await & Fetch API; URL DT; Properties & Methods
    20. DOM API; HTMLCollection DT; NodeList DT; Quering; Elements; Attributes; Styles; Iteration & Class; Events: copy, mouse; Forms & Keyboard events
    21. LocalStorage API; Properties & Methods
    22. TypeScript
    23. Unit testing
  2. Backend
    1. Nod.EJS
    2. MongoDB (NoSQL)
  3. Angular
    1. Firebase
  4. Vue
    1. Vite
    2. NuxtJS
    3. SQL
  5. React
    1. Legacy
      • Internal React
      • CRA
      • Class components, setState & props without destructuring
      • Redux
    2. Modern
      • Components: JSX, import/export, Statics (Images, CSS), Events, Lists, Conditionals, Props
      • React DOM: Portals
      • Hooks: useState, useEffect, useRef, useCallback, useReducer, etc..., Custom Hooks
      • Context API
      • React-Router(-DOM)
      • NextJS
      • Prisma (with PostgreSQL)
    3. React Native
    4. Electrum
  6. Bonus
    1. D3.js
    2. three.js
    3. Svelte
    4. Bun
    5. AI...
